description: One Jersey politician says racism and slavery have become "muddled" in a debate over Trenton Square.
title: Trenton Square in Jersey to keep slave-trade links name
title_page: Trenton Square in Jersey to keep slave-trade links name - BBC News
maintext: He said: "The answer is to fund the learning and teaching of Jersey's histories in school and beyond, so that all of us can begin to understand how we got here."
